segments.text: I'm observing this scene, and a feeling of frustration is beginning to rise within me.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: How can the woman be so completely oblivious to everything happening?
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The sink is practically a waterfall, creating a huge puddle on the floor.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: Her foot is in it, yet she continues drying that plate as if nothing's wrong.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: It makes me angry to see such a lack of awareness in a potentially dangerous situation.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: Behind her, the children are engaged in risky behavior on an unstable stool.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The boy could fall, and the girl is complicit in this cookie heist.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: Why isn't anyone paying attention to the hazards building up?
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: This level of detachment from one's surroundings is truly vexing.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: It's a recipe for disaster, and it's happening right before my eyes.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: I just want to shout and alert them to the mess and the danger.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The calm exterior of the woman only adds to my irritation.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: Someone needs to notice what's going on in this kitchen.
segments.speaker: PAR
